content: Sure, lots of people. What would you like to know?
Who is giving you a Lean 4 assignment?
That's not really what we do on this Zulip, but if you want to ask questions about specific places you are stuck, I'm sure there will be people around to help you make progress.
This topic was moved here from #general > lean 4 by Eric Wieser.

I need someone who can be available for one hour to help me complete an assignment in Lean 4

There's no need to look for somebody, you can just post a question here and get answer from lots of people!
Though people are unlikely to do your homework for you, especially if you're hiding your name (edit: and email address) and trying to do things privately so that your instructor can't find out.

im no longer in a position where questions gonna help me

Zulip is by far the best place to ask these questions as all the experts are here; if you've had no luck with questions so far, it's probably because you've been asking them somewhere else
D I has marked this topic as resolved.
It looks like @_Dayyan Imran has deactivated their account and deleted all their messages to cover their tracks...
I wonder if that holds the record for shortest account activation period.
